item.title: 美国继承人即将获得 105 万亿美元的遗产意外之财
item.description:
股市和房价的上涨帮助许多美国老年人积累了大笔遗产，但继承遗产的人数比例仍然很小

。【原文：

Rising stock markets and home prices have helped many older Americans amass large estates, but the share of people who inherit money has remained small

】

item.title: Nvidia 同意在东南亚开设人工智能中心
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）创始人兼首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）签署了一项协议，将在越南开设人工智能研发中心，以加强该公司在东南亚的业务。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s founder and Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang signed a deal to open an artificial intelligence research and development center in Vietnam as the company steps up its presence in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 中国太阳能产业应效仿美国页岩气以缓解危机
item.description:
与其推行类似欧佩克（OPEC）的政策来控制产量和价格，这个陷入困境的行业不如精益求精。【原文：

The embattled sector would be better off getting lean than pursuing OPEC-like policies to control production and prices.

】

item.title: TikTok 寻求法院支持，特朗普暂缓美国禁令
item.description: TikTok 正在焦急地等待与即将实施的美国禁令有关的法律裁决，但首先...【原文：TikTok is anxiously awaiting a legal decision related to its upcoming US ban, but first…】

item.title: 欧佩克+推迟三个月恢复石油生产
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+将恢复石油生产的时间推迟了三个月，这是欧佩克第三次推迟这一行动，而原油价格却在过剩迫在眉睫的情况下挣扎。【原文：OPEC+ delayed the revival of its oil production by three months, delegates said, the third time it’s deferred the move while crude prices struggle amid a looming surplus.】

item.title: 阿布扎比统治家族购买 6,150 万英镑伦敦豪宅
item.description: 阿布扎比的统治家族阿勒纳哈扬（Al Nahyan）在伦敦荷兰公园（Holland Park）附近购买了一栋豪宅，成为该市今年最昂贵的住宅房产购买之一。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s ruling Al Nahyan family has bought a mansion in London’s Holland Park neighborhood, marking one of the city’s most expensive residential property purchases of the year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚在全球贸易动荡中看到了机遇
item.description: 澳大利亚 10 月份的出口在液化天然气的推动下大幅增长，然而，由于美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普准备在 2025 年启动关税和潜在的贸易战，这个依赖中国的经济体面临着越来越不确定的前景。【原文：Australia’s exports jumped in October fueled by liquefied natural gas, yet this China-reliant economy faces an increasingly uncertain outlook as President-elect Donald Trump prepares to unleash tariffs and potentially trade wars in 2025.】

item.title: 德国 RWE 据称将启动 20 亿欧元的 Amprion 股份出售计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德国最大的电力生产商 RWE AG 正在启动出售其在电网运营商 Amprion GmbH 少数股权的程序。【原文：Germany’s largest power producer RWE AG is starting a sale process for its minority stake in grid operator Amprion GmbH, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description: 特朗普的终极交易额刚刚达到六位数。【原文：The ultimate Trump trade just hit six figures.】

item.title: 马克龙眼中的下一任法国总理人选
item.description: 现在，法国议会下院推翻了政府，使国家陷入了进一步的政治动荡，埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统将需要努力使他的议程回到正轨。【原文：Now that France’s lower house of parliament has toppled the government, plunging the country into further political turmoil, President Emmanuel Macron will need to try to get his agenda back on track.】

item.title: 冬季天气之谜引发流星能源通胀风险
item.description:
受地缘政治紧张局势和寒冷预报变化的影响，天然气、小麦和其他大宗商品将经历过山车式的波动。【原文：

Natural gas, wheat and other commodities are poised for a rollercoaster ride on geopolitical tensions and shifting forecasts for cold.

】

item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. agreed to sell liquefied natural gas to Malaysia’s Petronas for 15 years starting 2028, expanding the Middle East company’s efforts to become a major supplier of the fuel.】

item.title: 埃及镑自 3 月以来首次跌破 50 美元兑一磅
item.description: 埃及镑自 3 月贬值以来首次跌破 50 美元兑 1 美元的汇率，这是一个受到密切关注的里程碑，因为这个北非国家承诺将制定灵活的汇率。【原文：Egypt’s pound weakened past 50 per dollar for the first time since March’s devaluation, a closely watched milestone as the North African nation pledges to enact a flexible exchange rate.】

item.title: 尽管经济令人担忧，但加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）仍因信贷损失下降而实现业绩增长
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）本季度信贷质量再次好于预期，超出预期。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce beat estimates after another quarter of stronger-than-expected credit quality.】

item.title: 孤星公司加入在阿布扎比金融枢纽开业的公司行列
item.description: Lone Star Funds 将在阿布扎比开设办事处，成为最新一家将阿布扎比酋长国作为中东扩张中心的全球资产管理公司。【原文：Lone Star Funds is set to open an office in Abu Dhabi, becoming the latest global asset manager to use the emirate as a hub for expansion in the Middle East.】

item.title: 法国民调显示多数人希望 2025 年举行总统选举
item.description: 根据 Cluster17 为《观点》杂志进行的民意调查，大多数法国人希望埃马纽埃尔-马克龙辞职，并将原定于 2027 年举行的总统选举提前到明年。【原文：A majority of French people want Emmanuel Macron to resign and advance the presidential election scheduled for 2027 to next year, according to a poll by Cluster17 for Le Point magazine.】

item.title: 交易员为 Meta、Alphabet 和甲骨文设计 TikTok 方案
item.description: 技术投资者正在为 TikTok 法律纠纷的最新进展做准备。Meta Platforms Inc.等社交媒体和搜索公司以及甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp.【原文：Tech investors are girding for the latest development in TikTok’s legal saga. Social media and search companies like Meta Platforms Inc. have a lot at stake, as does Oracle Corp., which counts TikTok as a big customer.】

item.title: 冯德莱恩将出席南方共同市场峰会，欧盟贸易协议即将达成
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩将抵达乌拉圭出席南方共同市场峰会，因为该集团的目标是与主要拉美国家达成一项长期寻求的贸易协议。【原文：European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen is set to arrive in Uruguay to attend the Mercosur summit as the bloc aims to conclude a long-sought trade deal with key Latin American nations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国就对台军售对13家美国公司实施制裁
item.description: 中国已对 13 家美国军工企业实施制裁，以报复华盛顿计划向台湾出售武器，此举在很大程度上被视为象征性的，但有可能破坏这些企业的供应链。【原文：China has imposed sanctions on 13 US military companies in retaliation for Washington’s planned arms sales to Taiwan, a move seen as largely symbolic but which has the potential to disrupt the firms’ supply chains.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克为国会工作，目标是削减 2 万亿美元预算
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）将于周四前往国会大厦，为他从联邦预算中削减至少 2 万亿美元的雄心壮志点燃国会的热情，这是美国自二战结束以来前所未有的紧缩政策。【原文：Elon Musk is heading to the Capitol on Thursday to stoke congressional enthusiasm for his ambitious effort to slash at least $2 trillion from the federal budget, a level of austerity unprecedented in the US since the winding down of World War II.】

item.title: 260 亿英镑增税后，半数以上英国公司将提价
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）计划提高雇主工资税260亿英镑（约合330亿美元），一半以上的英国企业计划提高价格和裁员，以应对这一威胁，从而增加通胀压力。【原文：More than half of UK businesses plan to increase prices and cut jobs in response to Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ £26 billion ($33 billion) hike in employer payroll taxes, threatening to increase inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 智囊团称，到 2027 年中东与中国的贸易额将超过西方国家
item.description: 据一家智库的报告称，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的第二个白宫任期中，中东地区与中国的贸易将使该地区与西方传统盟国的关系黯然失色。【原文：The Middle East’s trade with China is set to eclipse the oil-rich region’s ties with their traditional Western allies midway through Donald Trump’s second term in the White House, according to a report from a think tank.】

item.title: 预算案公布后，英国房屋建造量创五个月来最大降幅
item.description: 上个月，S&P Global 的总体建筑业采购经理人指数（PMI）从 10 月份的 54.3 上升到 55.2，远高于经济学家预期的 53.5。任何高于 50 的指数都预示着增长。然而，商业工程和土木工程的强劲增长被房屋建筑商的部分增长所抵消，房屋建筑商在上个月出现萎缩。【原文：UK housebuilding declined at the sharpest pace in five months in November with construction firms blaming weak consumer confidence after the Labour government's first budget.S&P Global's overall construction PMI rose to a score of 55.2 last month, up from 54.3 in October and much better than the drop to 53.5 expected by economists. Any score above 50 signals growth. However, strong growth in commercial work and civil engineering was partially offset by housebuilders, which contracted for the】

item.title: 医药出口促使丹麦上调 2025 年增长预测
item.description: 丹麦政府预测，受诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）等制药商出口的推动，丹麦经济明年的增长速度将超过此前的预期。【原文：The Danish economy will expand faster next year than previously estimated, boosted by exports from drugmakers including Novo Nordisk A/S, the government forecast.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"开会讨论进一步推迟恢复石油产量的问题
item.description: 欧佩克+将于周四举行在线会议，讨论进一步推迟恢复石油生产的计划。【原文：OPEC+ will meet online on Thursday to discuss further delay to its plans to revive oil production.】

item.title: 沃达丰 150 亿英镑交易为欧洲整合打开大门
item.description: 沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）创建英国最大移动电话公司的交易获得批准，这是欧洲电信运营商的一个重要里程碑，为可能出现的行业整合浪潮打开了大门，使该行业得以重建。【原文：Vodafone Group Plc won approval for a deal to create the UK’s biggest mobile phone company in a major milestone for European telecommunications operators, opening the door for a potential wave of consolidation that would allow the industry to rebuild.】

item.title: 立法者称印尼将继续提高部分商品的增值税
item.description: 据一位立法者称，印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）计划在一月份提高部分商品的增值税率。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto plans to go ahead with raising the value-added tax rate on some goods in January, according to a lawmaker.】

item.title: 出口下降，南非经常账户缺口超出预期
item.description: 由于商品出口额的降幅大于商品进口额的降幅，南非第三季度经常账户赤字的收窄幅度超出预期。【原文：South Africa’s current-account deficit narrowed more than expected in the third quarter as the value of goods exports decreased more than merchandise imports.】
